channel.title: What do I have to do to get RS2 in offline mode?
channel.description:
the latest versdion of runescape before EoC is now unavalable. I was hopeing someone would be able to tell me what was involved with getting this client to run on my computer without internet or a jagex server.
Am I wrong in thinking I have to edit a .jar file's IP's?

the latest versdion of runescape before EoC is now unavalable. I was hopeing someone would be able to tell me what was involved with getting this client to run on my computer without internet or a jagex server.
